Cinder Documentation

Welcome

If you are just getting started, we recommend you begin with the Hello, Cinder guide. If you'd like to just get a sense of what's in Cinder, take a look at the Namespace list. And don't forget, the samples are still the best way to learn Cinder for now as we work to fill out the documentation.
